case_title: UNITED STATES OF AMERICA v. COOK
case_info_full_case_name: UNITED STATES OF AMERICA v. COOK

charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS - 21:846 i/c/w 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(C), &; 18:2 - Conspiracy to possess w/intent to distribute cocaine(1)
NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(C) &; 18:2 - Possession w/the Intentn to Distribute Cocaine(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 11 months imprisonment concurrent with revocation sentence presently serving-federal sentence began on 09/29/11; 3 years supervised release; $100 mandatory assessment fee;

judges.judge_name: US Magistrate Judge CHARLES H WEIGLE
